subject: New York City Marathon
Marathon Running
Juggling and Jugglers
lead_paragraph: Running a marathon is only half the battle for “jogglers” like Jack Hirschowitz, 67, who expects to juggle three balls for the entire distance.
snippet: Running a marathon is only half the battle for “jogglers” like Jack Hirschowitz, 67, who expects to juggle three balls for the entire distance.
